title: 2018-03-20 - Rootkit Umbreon - Umreon - x86, ARM samples
plain_text:
# Rootkit Umbreon / Umreon - x86, ARM samples

**contagiodump.blogspot.com/2018/03/rootkit-umbreon-umreon-x86-arm-samples.html**

[Pok√©mon-themed Umbreon Linux Rootkit Hits x86, ARM Systems](https://blog.trendmicro.com/trendlabs-security-intelligence/pokemon-themed-umbreon-linux-rootkit-hits-x86-arm-systems/)

Research: Trend Micro

There are two packages

one is 'found in the wild' full and a set of hashes from Trend Micro (all but one file are already in the full package)

**Download**

**[Download Email me if you need the password](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ce2rx54zydz95qb/Rootkit-umbreon.zip?dl=0)**

**File information**
